title: Even after the small 'nerfs', Talon still abuses melee matchups
body:
So, even as a Talon main, I feel as though the nerfs were in the wrong direction. Meddler clearly stated that Talon abuses melee matchups but instead of nerfing his melee Q, they nerfed his dash Q and they didn't even touch his Rake. The reason why Talon is abusive of melee champions is because of his melee Q crit, which deals 150% of Talon's AD. In the early game, this damage matters a lot and makes the laning phase hell for melee matchups. Also, Rake is an excellent zoning tool as well as a damage tool. Let's not forget his passive as well, which does 200% bonus bleed damage.

So my suggestions to nerf Talon are:

Make his crit scale with level, as he always maxes W first. Make the scalings something like this: 130%/135%/140%/145%/150%

Reduce the base damage of Rake in the early levels 

Make the bleed damage scale with levels 1/6/11/16: 150%/165%/180%/200%

These are my thoughts on how Talon can be balanced. As far as I can tell, he is still quite a strong pick in the mid lane and occasionally the top lane

replies.body:
By beef with Talon is his interaction with Yasuo.

You ult, and 12 blades spring out. **12.**

If any **one** of them nicks the windwall, **BAM** they all disappear.

Why?

When Twisted Fate's Q hits the windwall, only the cards that hit it disappear. 
It should be the same for Talon.

All Yasuo has to do in a fight is throw up his windwall, and Talon can't use half his kit.
It's pathetic.

Would be great if they could run around together.

http://imgur.com/a/IPZNx

I'll be honest, in all the Talon games I've played against a Yasuo, i never noticed this interaction because all Yasuo want to make flashy plays and just windwall Rake because muh flashy plays. Yes, this makes Talon pathetic against him but you still have the guaranteed crit and Tiamat up your sleeve, not to mention your high AD. Most Talons will be useless with their Ult, taking away their dueling potential and making them more reliant on their teammates for help but thats not my point. What I'm trying to say is that Talon is still oppressive  to melee match ups (minus Yasuo) with his bleed and guaranteed crits and the recent nerfs were in the wrong direction

to begin with, they nerfed his q damage not its speed or range.

But unlike renekton (easily a bigger bully) he drops off and has absolutely 0 usefulness lategame, while rene can still serve as a tank and cc bot.
